title: How to write an email to my college asking for books during this pandemic - Quora

response.answer_text: Md Zainul Abedin this is very easy, you write to the librarian, ask for the books and advise of your post address and say or I can come in …. finish with “thanks” and a coughing fit after your name.

Please check for previous ‘how do I write a letter’ answers rather than simply posting such a question as if you were the only person in the world to have a problem performing a simple task. A letter is a letter. State your purpose, then close. How hard is that?
